subject: Baseball
Left-Handedness
Trades (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Phillies added to their stable of potent left-handed hitters and put pressure on the Mets’ left-handed pitchers by signing Raúl Ibáñez on Friday.
snippet: The Philadelphia Phillies added to their stable of potent left-handed hitters and put pressure on the Mets’ left-handed pitchers by signing Raúl Ibáñez on Friday.
